steps.title: Prepare the Pork Belly
instructions: Roll the pork belly tightly and tie with butcher's twine to secure.
Sear the pork belly roll on all sides in a hot, lightly oiled pan until golden brown.

steps.title: Make the Braising Sauce
instructions: In the same pan, add minced garlic and ginger, saut√©ing until fragrant.
Pour in soy sauce, mirin, sake, and water, then add sugar, stirring to dissolve.

steps.title: Braise the Pork
instructions: Place the seared pork belly into the braising sauce.
Add green onions and bring to a simmer.
Cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 hours until the pork is tender.

steps.title: Finish and Serve
instructions: Remove the pork from the braising liquid and let it rest before slicing.
Strain the braising sauce and reduce to a thick glaze to coat the sliced pork.
